about_the_game:
Get ready to embark on a captivating memory challenge with "Find the Cats." This delightful game will put your memory skills to the test as you search for hidden feline friends in a charming and vibrant setting.

Immerse yourself in a playful world filled with adorable cats, each one eager to be discovered. Your objective is to remember the positions of the cats as they briefly reveal themselves and then hide among a multitude of objects. Sharpen your memory and observation skills as you strive to remember their exact locations.

As you progress through the levels, the difficulty increases, challenging your memory capacity and concentration. More cats will join the mix, making it even more challenging to keep track of their positions. Stay focused, embrace the challenge, and become a master at finding those elusive kitties.

"Find the Cats" offers a range of game modes to cater to different preferences and skill levels. Test your memory prowess in timed challenges, race against the clock to find all the cats, or enjoy a more relaxed experience in untimed gameplay. Compete with friends and family or challenge yourself to beat your own high scores.

The game features delightful visuals, colorful illustrations, and captivating animations that bring the feline world to life. Enjoy the cheerful sound effects as you successfully find the hidden cats, rewarding you for your keen observation and memory skills.

"Find the Cats" is a perfect game for players of all ages who enjoy memory challenges and have a soft spot for our feline friends. Exercise your brain, improve your memory, and experience the satisfaction of finding those adorable hidden cats. Are you up for the challenge? Start your quest to Find the Cats and unleash your inner memory master.

Features:
✔ Play by making matches of cats
✔ 12 difficulty levels: from 2x2 up to 7x6 cards
✔ Funny cats
✔ Simple and easy-to-master interface
✔ Train your brain: concentration, observation, and logic
✔ Challenging game modes
✔ With timeout so be fast

name: Find The Cats - Memory

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Pentium 4 or higher, 2GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB or higher
  • Storage: 120 MB available space
